summary: This document is an email correspondence between Richard Kahn and Geoff Cosgriff regarding a matter related to TD Ameritrade. It emphasizes confidentiality and includes a disclaimer about the nature of the communication.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is the sender of the email, communicating with Geoff Cosgriff.

persons.name: Geoff Cosgriff
persons.context: Geoff Cosgriff is the recipient of the email and a Senior Fixed Income Specialist at TD Ameritrade.

keyFacts: The email was sent on February 12, 2019.
Geoff Cosgriff is identified as a Senior Fixed Income Specialist at TD Ameritrade.
The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes a disclaimer about the communication.
Richard Kahn is associated with HBRK Associates Inc.
The email contains a notification regarding the prohibition of use, distribution, or copying of the communication if received in error.
